body:
Mostapha and Chris,



The Glazing_based_on_Ratio keeps crashing Rhino above a certain amount of zones.



First time I see a component completely crashing Rhino. I would assume it would just take longer time to compute.



Any advice on that?



I attach the file for your reference.



Thank you,

Dimitris
topic: Honeybee Glazing based on Ratio CRASHING
